评论概述: Cute but the top is SMALL
评论详情: I ordered this in a size small for a friend and slipped it on to make sure it was good before wrapping it up. I’m roughly a 32 DDD / F so obviously not the tiniest in the bust but I can usually get away with wearing “small” tops, definitely not this 😂 I thought it would be a cute crop top style, which on the right person I’m sure it is, but on me it gave both cleavage and under boob, but not in a cute way. Haha I would think A 32 D could probably get away with this top, but probably best suited for a C and under!

I struggle buying lingerie and PJs, I am a C in bra size, 18/20 in clothes, smaller waist but large hanging lower stomach. I was worried about buying these because of how skimpy they look but wanted to give it a try. I got a XL so it could fit tighter and it was actually a great fit! The straps are adjustable which was nice, it covered my breast and was more support than you would think, and the bottoms fit very flattering because they came up to my waist and the material and print hid my lower stomach. Wouldn’t wear to a PJ party but it is perfect for an intimate night at home.
It was super cute and comfortable. Nice texture.

I love the SweatyRocks line and this cute camisole & shorts combination is one of the reasons why. Both the print and design are top notch. The strawberry version has adjustable straps on the camisole so be careful when washing. I recommend delicate cycle for washing and air drying it. I've washed mine a few times and it's help up fine. I'm 165 lbs and am 5'9" and the large fits perfectly. Can't wait to get the "Moon Child" version!

I am 5'6 147Ibs and it fit nicely I just couldn't tell front from back with the bottoms but wearing them backwards doesn't bother me if I am bc I can't tell.  It's very comfortable, soft not itchy BUT since I have wider hips but a slim waist they're sort of uncomfortable sitting up there above my belly button it's a little tight and gives me a forever wedgie (not super bad bc the fabric is soft and breathable back there) it's definitely cheeky. And you can definitely see the girls if you're going all natural But all in all super cute!

评论概述: Sweet Dreams in Strawberry Bliss she looks like a cupcake
评论详情: I recently surprised my wife with the SweatyRocks Women's Summer Strawberry Print Cami Top and Shorts Sleepwear Pajamas Set, and it's safe to say it's become her new nighttime favorite. She can't stop bragging about its comfort, and here's why:  The strawberry print adds a playful and adorable touch, making bedtime feel like a sweet escape. The cami top is not only cute but also incredibly comfortable, providing the right amount of coverage without sacrificing breathability. The adjustable spaghetti straps allow for a personalized fit, ensuring maximum comfort.  The shorts are equally delightful, featuring the same charming strawberry print and an elastic waistband that doesn't dig in. The lightweight fabric is perfect for warm nights, keeping her cool and cozy.  What truly sets this sleepwear set apart is the quality of the material. It's soft, smooth, and feels luxurious against the skin—exactly what you want for a good night's sleep. The attention to detail, from the stitching to the print, reflects a commitment to both style and comfort.  If you're looking for cute, comfy, and charming sleepwear, the SweatyRocks Pajamas Set is a fantastic choice. It's the perfect blend of style and coziness, making bedtime a delightful experience. My wife gives it five stars, and I couldn't agree more!

评论概述: Cute but just not worth the price
评论详情: Quality was not too great and the material was pretty cheap. Just don’t think it was worth the price even though they are cute

Yeah it's really cute, the fabric's decently light and soft, but this set is NOT meant for adults or anyone with grown proportions. It's absolutely tiny, and while I can deal with wearing some things that are considered too small, the seam where the straps connect are sewn unevenly. One is in an entirely different fashion than the other, and it's way higher up with a shorter strap, so it's lopsided when you wear it--enough so that half of your whole chest will FALL OUT of the top. The straps are manual ties, and I tried for a good few months to tie it in various ways to offset this but ultimately the difference in the two is not something you can work with. The shorts are alright I suppose, but for your money, you could just buy a much better, not cheaply slapped together sleep set from someone else.
